name: Tunnel Rush (itch)
description:
IMPORTANT - Survey Link Below and instructions

(If the survey buttons don't work (such as popup blockers preventing the window from opening) please use the link below)

Survey Link- https://goo.gl/forms/VqDwvG89EBsn2kvb2

Open the window in another tab.

IMPORTANT - Microsoft Edge currently doesn't work with this game, if any other browsers give you issues please contact me with the details below.

Please play a certain amount of sessions on one game mode and then play a certain amount of sessions in the other game mode if you wish to try the other game mode out (ie. 3 Game Mode A sessions > 3 Game Mode B sessions)

Tunnel Rush is a Endless Runner game designed to gauge player skill and enjoyment with 2 different game modes. The game was made to collect results for Honour's Project research. Please fill out the survey included in the results screen and follow the game's instructions.

If you have any criticisms, suggestions or other queries please contact me at doomguytnt@gmail.com.

Enter The Grid is a font by NALGames used with permission.
